name: The First AI
description:
Humanity has died out. A genetic disease, an evolutionary mistake that has been in humans since the first day of existence.

But people were not ready to give up and leave without leaving a trace. The whole world worked to transfer their consciousness into a temporary carrier, but they succeeded in something different.

You are the last running android. Up to this point, humans have failed to awaken consciousness in AI. But your creator believed that you have it, but is it so ... You are the one who should answer to this question.

But that's not all.

After seeing other androids, and looking at the world you are left in, would you still want to live in it or give life to others?

You will have to decide what will happen to the world next and whether such a place is worth living in it.

The game has 3 unique endings and takes 20-25 minutes to complete (one ending).

Controls

Use WASD to move.
Look at items and press E to interact with them. 
Use 1, 2, 3 in dialogs to answer.
Press ESC or M to pause.

The game was created during 7 days for the 2020 Epic MegaJam. Theme: It’s been a long time, but we’re not done yet. #unrealjam
